name: hackathon-2024
description: GNPL: Get Now, Pay Later via USSD

scripts.install:all: (npm install) && (cd open-payments-hackathon && npm install) && (cd open-loans-mobile-simulator/client && npm install) && (cd open-loans-mobile-simulator/server && npm install)
